text:
Antonio Sabàto Sr. (2 April 1943 – 10 January 2021) was an Italian-American actor. He was the father of model and actor Antonio Sabàto Jr. He was known for his roles in spaghetti western movies. His best known movies were "One Dollar Too Many" and "Due volte Giuda".
Sabàto Sr. died in Los Angeles on 10 January 2021 from COVID-19, aged 77.
